aboutUs.description2: Join us to enhance your learning experience!

events.heading: Introducing Our Events
events.intro: Welcome to the English Club! We are excited to announce upcoming events designed to enhance your skills, make new friends, and enjoy fun experiences. Check out our events below!

first_event.title: Practice Speaking English: Travel

location.name: Jan Cafe
location.address: 1/48 Đ. Đặng Thuỳ Trâm, Phường 13, Bình Thạnh, TP. Hồ Chí Minh

first_event.description: Join the first event of the Affinity English Club with fun and educational activities! This session will focus on practicing English in the context of travel, perfect for anyone looking to improve their conversational skills while discussing travel experiences, destinations, and tips.
activities: Group discussions on favorite travel destinations
Role-playing travel scenarios (e.g., booking hotels, asking for directions)
first_event.target_audience: All levels of English speakers are welcome!

second_event.title: Boardgame Session: Werewolf by Night

location.name: Jan Cafe
location.address: 1/48 Đ. Đặng Thuỳ Trâm, Phường 13, Bình Thạnh, TP. Hồ Chí Minh

second_event.description: Join the second event with exciting and engaging board games! This event will encourage team collaboration, critical thinking, and lots of fun as you participate in the classic game 'Werewolf' under the moonlight.
activities: Werewolf game with team roles and scenarios
second_event.target_audience: All levels of English speakers are welcome, especially those who enjoy strategic games and social interaction!

map_description: This is the event location. Click the image to view the map.
